project_abstract.cdata: The project consists of: (1) construction and installation of about 132.5 miles of 275 kV lines and associated substations to link up the Temengor Hydroelectric Scheme with NEB's system at Papan and to extend the main system southward from Port Dickson to Malacca; (2) extension of associated transmission and distribution system under 275 kV; (3) establishment of control and load dispatching center; and (4) provision of consulting services.
